Data Fields
Vps_DctrlVencInfo Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Display Controller API

Structure containing venc information. This structure is used is IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_SET_CONFIG API to configure mode in the Vencs. It also is used to inform which vencs are tied. Two vencs are tied when both are running on the same pixel clock and vsync signal for both the vencs are synchronized. If two vencs are tied, they will be enabled at the same time in order to have both synchronized. Note that if each of tied venc is configured with the different modes, display controller does not check whether venc synchronization is possible or not with the given modes. More...

#include <vps_displayCtrlDataTypes.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 numVencs
 
Vps_DctrlModeInfo modeInfo [VPS_DCTRL_MAX_VENC]
 
UInt32 tiedVencs
 

Detailed Description

Structure containing venc information. This structure is used is IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_SET_CONFIG API to configure mode in the Vencs. It also is used to inform which vencs are tied. Two vencs are tied when both are running on the same pixel clock and vsync signal for both the vencs are synchronized. If two vencs are tied, they will be enabled at the same time in order to have both synchronized. Note that if each of tied venc is configured with the different modes, display controller does not check whether venc synchronization is possible or not with the given modes.

struct Vps_DctrlVencInfo

Field Documentation

Vps_DctrlModeInfo Vps_DctrlVencInfo::modeInfo[VPS_DCTRL_MAX_VENC]

Mode Information to be set the Venc.

UInt32 Vps_DctrlVencInfo::numVencs

Number of valid entries in modeInfo array

UInt32 Vps_DctrlVencInfo::tiedVencs

Bitmask of tied vencs. Two vencs, which uses same pixel clock and whose vsync are synchronized, can be tied together.
